label: description
comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.

domainIncludes.comment: A legal proof of ownership, worthiness or qualification to operate an agricultural item.
A practice of cultivating land, raising crops, or treatment of the agricultural produce.
A field with one or more cultivated plants or produce from one or more botanical species or varieties.
A method or substance, such as chemical fertilizers and crop protection products, applied to plant growth whilst managing and controlling diseases and pests.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an agricultural object.
Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two or more parties.
A specified computer file or program stored in a binary format.
The process of doing something in order to make something happen or to deal with a situation.
An amount, size, or extent as established by measuring.
The quantity analysis for this work item.
An unattractive or unsatisfactory characteristic.
A photograph or video still represented as a digital image for electronic sharing.
The particular state of something, affected by use, that should be respected.
A reference to a physical location or place.
The conditions and requirements of the type of person who may use or purchase a product or service.
A person, organization, thing or place from which information comes, arises or is obtained.
Representation of real world phenomenon associated with a location relative to the Earth, such as cities, buildings, roads, rivers, forests and lakes.
The exchange of thoughts, messages, or information, as universally exchanged by speech, signals, writing, or behaviour between persons and/or organizations.
A specified period of time.
A measure of spatial extent associated with this work item, such as length, breadth, or height.
The information relevant to a condition related to a document.
An endeavour carefully planned to achieve a procurement of goods, works and service.
A specified textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a metric (a standard of measurement).
A specific period of time such as the length of time between two known date/time points, from a start date onwards, or up to an end date for which something is available.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a document.
An attribute of a geographical object.
An identified defect or fault.
The state of belonging to a group, such as a club or trade association.
A series of planned activities or things to be done in this supply chain.
A measure of spatial extent of an object, such as the length, breadth or height of a shipping container.
A distinctive or characteristic part of something.
A specified physical location or place.
A specified feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases.
The location at which a particular trade related organization or person may be found or reached.
A significant occurrence or happening during transport.,A referenced significant occurrence or happening during transport.
The identification of related information for an inspection.
The direction to related information for this laboratory observation.
A way to protect something, such as human beings, animals or environment, from getting infected or becoming ill.
A certified recognition that provides evidence of a level of competency in a given area, such as certifying a level of skill in a trade.
Improvements taken to eliminate causes of non-conformities or other undesirable situations, such as to an organization's processes or products.
An adjustment, such as a change to an organization's processes or products, taken to prevent non-conformities or other undesirable situations, possibly as a result of a risk analysis.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that an organization has met required organizational criteria.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.
A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a product batch has met required criteria.
A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence about the product.
A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
A distinct operation or task that is part of a process.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a product.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a group of products considered or dealt with together.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
The process of performing documented checks of sustainability characteristics, with a focus on discovering deviations, related to documented sustainability requirements.
A specified act or instance of viewing or noting a fact or occurrence for some scientific or other special purpose.
Material which exhibits adverse effects on living organisms.
A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.

A plan of action agreed or chosen in order to obey rules or requests made by people in authority and designed to prevent and detect violations of applicable law, regulations, rules and ethical standards by employees, agents and others.
A prominent attribute or aspect of a process.
A prominent technical attribute or aspect.
A permit from an authority to own or use something, do a particular thing, or to conduct a trade.
An act of notification by formal documentation or action, in any form prescribed or accepted, such as a self-declaration.
The process of performing documented checks, such as on materials or processes, with a focus on discovering deviations, errors or faults related to documented requirements.
A place from which water originates, such as a hot spring or lake that provides water to public drinking water supplies and private wells.
The result of a logistics risk analysis calculation.
A set of measurable factors that specifies the conditions of its operation within a specific context.
A set of measurable factors that specifies the conditions within which an entity operates correctly.
The information relevant to a condition related to an inspection.
A set of instructions detailing how to properly dispose of a material.
A significant occurrence or happening related to an inspection.
Information of an instructive nature that describes how to conduct an inspection.
Information of an instructive nature that describes how to conduct this laboratory observation.
A feature that is fixed for the case in question but may be different in other cases for this observation objective.
Instructions for a period of imposed isolation or detention.
Common conditions contained in a contract or agreement applicable between trading partners.
Temperature setting related information of an instructive nature.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an organization.
A distinctive feature of a material contained within physical goods.
A substance from which something is or could be made.
A process of either regaining substances in usable form, or of getting rid of substances regarding waste material, such as production waste.
Transport information of an instructive nature.
A measurement of the variation limits of an ingredient.
A production material component that is unused and rejected as unwanted.
A process of either regaining waste substances in usable form, or of getting rid of waste substances resulting from production.
